meanings.def: a hard brown sweet food made from cocoa beans, used in cooking to add taste to cakes, etc. or eaten as a sweet
examples: He broke off a few squares of chocolate.
Melt 100g of cooking chocolate in a basin over hot water.
She broke a bar of chocolate into four pieces.
Stir until the chocolate has melted.
a box of brazil nuts coated in chocolate

meanings.def: a sweet that is made of or covered with chocolate
examples: I gave her a box of hand-made Belgian chocolates.

meanings.def: a drink made by mixing chocolate powder with hot water or milk; a cup of this drink
